trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Implementa a interface <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface, which is the managed interface used to add handlers for menu commands and to define verbs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> classe implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface, que é a interface gerenciada usada para adicionar manipuladores de comandos de menu e para definir os verbos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> class is automatically offered by the package class to offer global commands for an entire package, and it is also offered by the `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.WindowPane` class to offer commands for the current window.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> classe automaticamente é oferecida pela classe de pacote para oferecer comandos globais para um pacote inteiro, e também é oferecido pelo `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.WindowPane` classe oferecer comandos para a janela atual.

trans-unit.source: This offering is always done through the service container, so anyone deriving from the package or window pane classes can remove or replace the default implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface.
trans-unit.target: Esta oferta sempre é feita por meio do contêiner de serviço, portanto qualquer pessoa derivando de pacote ou classes de painel de janela podem remover ou substituir a implementação padrão da <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> class utilizes several other services.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> classe utiliza vários outros serviços.

trans-unit.source: All of these services are optional, so the behavior of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> class degrades if one or more services are missing.
trans-unit.target: Todos esses serviços são opcionais, portanto, o comportamento do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> classe afeta se um ou mais serviços não estão presentes.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows which services are used and for what purpose.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra quais serviços são usados e para cada finalidade.

trans-unit.source: Service
trans-unit.target: Serviço

trans-unit.source: Purpose
trans-unit.target: Finalidade

trans-unit.source: Used to discover the current selection in order to obtain verbs offered by the currently selected designer.
trans-unit.target: Usado para descobrir a seleção atual para obter os verbos oferecidos pelo designer selecionado no momento.

trans-unit.source: Used to obtain the designer for the currently selected component, if any.
trans-unit.target: Usado para obter o designer do componente selecionado no momento, se houver.

trans-unit.source: Used to notify Visual Studio that the command status has changed.
trans-unit.target: Usado para notificar o Visual Studio que o status do comando foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Used to show context menus.
trans-unit.target: Usado para mostrar os menus de contexto.

trans-unit.source: The service provider that this service uses to obtain other services.
trans-unit.target: O provedor de serviço que esse serviço usa para obter outros serviços.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.

trans-unit.source: If the service is being used with a designer, the `serviceProvider` parameter should be the service provider for the designer, as is the case with <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.
trans-unit.target: Se o serviço está sendo usado com um designer, o `serviceProvider` parâmetro deve ser o provedor de serviços para o designer, como é o caso com <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a command handler to the menu command service.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um manipulador de comando para o serviço de comando de menu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A> method adds a command handler to the menu command service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A> método adiciona um manipulador de comandos para o serviço de comando de menu.

trans-unit.source: Command handlers do not define the text, shortcut, or placement of a menu item.
trans-unit.target: Manipuladores de comandos não definem o texto, o atalho ou a colocação de um item de menu.

trans-unit.source: Rather, they define the menu item’s behavior if the item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, eles definem o comportamento do item de menu se o item é clicado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="command" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="command" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A command handler <paramref name="command" /> already exists.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de comandos <paramref name="command" /> já existe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a verb to the verb table of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um verbo à tabela de verbos de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.

trans-unit.source: This verb is available regardless of what designer is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Este verbo está disponível, independentemente de qual designer está selecionado no momento.

trans-unit.source: Unlike menu commands, verbs can define the text that is displayed to the user, but they do not define the placement of the command on the actual menu.
trans-unit.target: Diferentemente dos comandos de menu, verbos podem definir o texto que é exibido para o usuário, mas eles não definem o posicionamento do comando no menu real.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="verb" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="verb" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> método deixa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose()` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the verb list has been created.
trans-unit.target: Garante que a lista de verbos tenha sido criada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.EnsureVerbs%2A> method creates the verb list if it has not already been created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.EnsureVerbs%2A> método cria a lista de verbos se ele já não tiver sido criado.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associated with the given command ID.
trans-unit.target: Procura o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associado à ID de comando especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> to find.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associated with the given command ID.
trans-unit.target: Procura o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associado à ID de comando especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associated with the given command; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if the command is not found.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associado ao comando fornecido; caso contrário, <see langword="null" /> se o comando não for encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the command.
trans-unit.target: O GUID do comando.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the command.
trans-unit.target: A ID do comando.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associated with the given command.
trans-unit.target: Procura o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associado ao comando especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associated with the given command; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if the command is not found.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> associado ao comando fornecido; caso contrário, <see langword="null" /> se o comando não for encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the command list.
trans-unit.target: O GUID da lista de comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the command list for a given GUID.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de comandos para um GUID específico.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of commands.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> de comandos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do serviço a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the requested service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência ao serviço solicitado.

trans-unit.source: A reference to <paramref name="serviceType" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if the service is not found.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a <paramref name="serviceType" />; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />, se o serviço não tiver sido encontrado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serviceType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a command on the local form or in the global environment.
trans-unit.target: Invoca um comando no formato local ou no ambiente global.

trans-unit.source: The command to invoke.
trans-unit.target: O comando a ser invocado.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given command on the local form or in the global environment.
trans-unit.target: Invoca um comando especificado na forma local ou no ambiente global.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the command was found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, se o comando foi encontrado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The local form is first searched for the given command ID.
trans-unit.target: O formulário local é pesquisado pela primeira vez para a ID de comando especificada.

trans-unit.source: If it is found, it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Se for encontrado, ele é invocado.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the command ID is passed to the global environment command handler, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, a ID de comando é passada para o manipulador de comando de ambiente global, se houver um disponível.

trans-unit.source: The command to invoke.
trans-unit.target: O comando a ser invocado.

trans-unit.source: A parameter for the invocation.
trans-unit.target: Um parâmetro para a invocação.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given command with the given parameter on the local form or in the global environment.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o comando especificado com o parâmetro especificado na forma local ou no ambiente global.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the command was found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, se o comando foi encontrado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The local form is first searched for the given command ID.
trans-unit.target: O formulário local é pesquisado pela primeira vez para a ID de comando especificada.

trans-unit.source: If it is found, it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Se for encontrado, ele é invocado.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the command ID is passed to the global environment command handler, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, a ID de comando é passada para o manipulador de comando de ambiente global, se houver um disponível.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the status of a menu command has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o status de um comando de menu muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.MenuCommandsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.MenuCommandsChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged%2A> method is called by a menu command when its status has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged%2A> método é chamado por um comando de menu quando seu status é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged(System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged(System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged(System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.OnCommandsChanged(System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The command to remove.
trans-unit.target: O comando a remover.

trans-unit.source: Removes the given menu command from the document.
trans-unit.target: Remove o comando de menu especificado do documento.

trans-unit.source: If there are no more commands in the command group, the group is removed.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum outro comando no grupo de comando, o grupo é removido.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="command" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="command" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The verb to remove.
trans-unit.target: O verbo a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the given verb from the document.
trans-unit.target: Remove o verbo especificado do documento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="verb" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="verb" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu to display.
trans-unit.target: O menu de atalho a exibir.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the shortcut menu's location.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do local do menu de atalho.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the shortcut menu's location.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do local do menu de atalho.

trans-unit.source: Shows the shortcut menu with the given command ID at the given location.
trans-unit.target: Mostra o menu de atalho com a ID de comando especificada no local especificado.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation does nothing.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão não fará nada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the designer verbs that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção dos verbos do designer que estão disponíveis no momento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> of the designer verbs that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> dos verbos do designer que estão disponíveis no momento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Verbs%2A> property provides a collection of verbs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Verbs%2A> propriedade fornece um conjunto de verbos.

trans-unit.source: These verbs come from two places:
trans-unit.target: Esses verbos vir de dois locais:

trans-unit.source: Verbs added through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Verbs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Verbos adicionados por meio de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.Verbs%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Verbs offered by the currently selected designer.
trans-unit.target: Verbos oferecidos pelo designer selecionado no momento.

trans-unit.source: Verbs added to this service through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> method are called global verbs because they are global to this service, but generally there is one instance of this service for each tool or document window.
trans-unit.target: Verbos adicionados para esse serviço por meio de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A> método são chamados de verbos global porque eles são globais para esse serviço, mas geralmente há uma instância desse serviço para cada janela de ferramenta ou documento.

trans-unit.source: Designer verbs are obtained by querying the service provider for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>.
trans-unit.target: Verbos do Designer são obtidos consultando o provedor de serviços para <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>.

trans-unit.source: If the selection service offers a primary selection, and a designer can be obtained for that selection from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>, the designer’s verbs are added to this list.
trans-unit.target: Se o serviço de seleção oferece uma seleção principal e um designer pode ser obtido para seleção de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>, verbos do designer são adicionados a essa lista.

trans-unit.source: If the name of a global verb conflicts with the name of a designer verb, the designer-provided designer verb takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se o nome de um verbo global está em conflito com o nome de um verbo do designer, o verbo do designer fornecida pelo designer terá precedência.
